medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient was in usual state of health until 2 nights ago when he developed vague abdominal pain, initially attributed to possible gas pain or food intolerance. The pain intensified over the course of the day yesterday and this morning was severe and localized to the right lower quadrant. No frank fevers or chills, no emesis, and no diarrhea.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Left Jaw Neoplasm, Asthma as child, Obesity.
